page.title: 09COMMUNITY POLICING
page.content: P.C. Gallantry is our{community policeman A community policeman is one who only works in a certain area all of the time.He beat starts at Fabian Rd it is bordered by Church Lane and then it extends as far as the docks. The worst area on his patrol is Dalton Rd and Cumberland Rd.It is a hard area to police and has suffered a lot of vandalism because it has no static population.The people keep moving out and other people move in so that P.C. Gallantry cannot get to know these people so he cannot help them. P.C. Gallantry works his own hours every day,but he has to work a total of 40hrs per week.He deals with valuable thefts under Â£200 and criminal damage.To find out about crimes which have been committed he reports to {South Bank}police station. By D.Spensley,L.Harrison,C.Crowther.
